Title: Requires prior written notice upon hiring and once annually to all employees, informing them of the types of electronic monitoring which may occur
Summary: Requires prior written notice upon hiring to all employees, informing them of the types of electronic monitoring which may occur; provides employers shall also post the notice of electronic monitoring.
LawCode: Add ยง52-c, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to electronic monitoring
